metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11731 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An invalid memory read vulnerability was found in the function OpCode(called from isLogicalOp and decompileIF) in util/decompile.c in Ming0.4.8, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a craftedfile.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
